data.name: Magia X - Caleera
data.detailed_description:
*Character Description
A member of a warlike and proud dragon clan. Originally, dragons respect adults and young people are careful with their words, but this new group pays no mind to tradition. They speak their minds and are clear with their intentions.

* Combat Features  #Destruction
The attack range is short, but the skills that can narrow the distance to the enemy at once and the type that uses destructive attacks to melt enemies.
